title: 后台不正常关机之后重启再也开不了服
author: 夜鸣蛋
txt_content:
删除world试过了。。然而连地图生成步骤都没到就报错
插件,MODS文件夹也删过。。同上

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// But it works on my machine.

Time: 15-9-18 下午6:13
Description: Exception in server tick loop

com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Expected BEGIN_ARRAY but was STRING at line 1 column 1

replies.author: topjxr
replies.txt_content: 不正常关服导致了数据损坏，所以尽可能正常关服，只能换mc核心文件了

replies.author: 战魂IXA
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-75309
大概翻译的意思是官方表示这是个bug，最好通过彻底删除.minecraft+重装来解决
